references: Related: CF 279316, CF 278034, Ord 102210. Amending: Ord 103176.
summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Section 3 of Ordinance 103176 relating to the Poplar Place South Sanitary Sewer Replacement Project to provide for deposit of funds appropriated therein for works of art in Municipal Arts Account No. 626 of the Sewer Fund.
